org.nise.ux.asl.face

Interface SimpleServiceResponserFactory<D,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Type of <Data> being listened on <listening port>
    R - Type of <Response> to be sent toward service-client

    public interface SimpleServiceResponserFactory<D,R>
    Interface used to create SimpleServiceResponser instances.
    Because Managed Servicing System needs to create and destroy serving threads dynamically you're required to implement your own factory to let system produce instances of SimpleServiceResponser<D, R> at runtime.
    Author:
    Yaser Eftekhari ( ^ - ^ )

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleServiceResponser<D,R> getSimpleServiceResponser()
      Create a new instance of SimpleServiceResponser<D, R>

      • getSimpleServiceResponser
